coded_answer.p: I am writing to complain about the musical show, which I have seen in The Circle Theatre on 6th June. On that date, I decided to spend one evening seeing a musical show as I was on holiday in London and was interested in the musialmusical show. But things started to go wrong from the beginning.

The first problem was the price of tickets. I expected to buy a ticket cheaply but no discounts were available. Another problem was that the show started forty-five minutes late. I found the theatertheatre rather noisy as I arrived very early to sit in the front row. Although I got a bit annoyed, I tried to have a good time.

However, something wrong came upoccurred again. The actor 'Danny brook', whom you advertised in the brocherbrochure, did not play a part in the show. And I was really disappointed fromwith the different actor's performance. He kept forgetting his lines. Finally, I went to the restaurant to have something for dinner after the show, but it was closed because it was refurbishingbeing refurbished interior. I am not satisfied with your show as it was compeletlycompletely different from the advertisement.
I am therefore writing to ask for a full refund. I expect to receive a cheque for Â£20. I look forward to hearing soon.
